articles.author: Keith Collantine
articles.title: Leclerc dominates Virtual Vietnam Grand Prix as Norris fails to start again | 2020 F1 season
articles.description: Charles Leclerc controlled proceedings in the second virtual grand prix, winning as he pleased from pole position, but technical problems kept Lando Norris from starting.
